rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
The segment describes analysis factually without high-potency verbs or potent metaphors.
The segment does not contain a moderate verb paired with significant scale or impact.
The segment does not contain a loaded rhetorical question.
The segment reports analysis will be necessary but contains no explicit calming language.
The segment does not contain a minimiser used in conjunction with a scale contrast for reassurance.
Describes a planned action/capability (preparedness/investigation): "Analysing the genetic data of the virus will be necessary to determine".
